name: Affogato
description: The affogato is a simple combination of espresso and vanilla gelato, but this grown-up dessert tastes far more complex and decadent thanks to the contrast of the warm and bitter espresso against the cool, creamy gelato.
ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla gelato, or ice cream
2 ounces hot espresso, or strongly brewed hot coffee
instructions: Gather the ingredients. In a chilled glass or dessert dish, place a large scoop of vanilla gelato or ice cream. Slowly pour the espresso or coffee over the ice cream. Garnish with shaved or grated chocolate, and serve with a spoon.
